data.description:
The checkered flag is about to drop on an exciting Virtual Reality racing experience! Get in the drivers’ seat and race against other opponents in your own customized kart. Race through stunning tracks, collect power ups and use weapons to gain the upper hand over other racers. 

VR Karts is a fun and approachable Virtual Reality racing game. 

Let’s race! 

Features: 
Single Player racing experience 
Championship Trophy Mode 
Online multiplayer mode 
Kart customization 
A host of different weapons to slow down your opponents 
Speed pickups to boost you to the finish line

changelog.change_log: Controller fixes for using a gamepad

Controller fixes
Leaderboard/Online points fixes
Misc bug fixes

- New environment: Kart Canyon
- New tracks
- Enhanced driver and kart customization including helmet props
- Upgraded graphics
- Stability and performance improvements

-	Added 2 new weapons: Beehive (beehives for all on your head – shake your head to remove it) / Portal (jump forward into the track if you’re lagging behind)
-	Voting option added to Online Room
-	Improved AI
-	Improved chat mechanic
-	Added extra customization to player to include individual helmet colors
-	Lots of optimizations to make the game run better
-	More online multiplayer bug fixes
-	Improved Frontend menu selection
-	Removed the Speed option

- Online multiplayer stability improvements
- Online multiplayer chat feature
- New tutorial
- Level scale fixes and optimisation
- Championship mode difficulty balancing

- Multiplayer lobby improvements for a better user experience
- Graphical improvements
- Weapon balancing for reverse weapon
